description: This file contains asynchronous functions to generate reports on AI providers using an agent-based system, including setup of tasks, gathering results, and printing outputs.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent capable of performing tasks with specified models and tools.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for interacting with OpenAI's chat models.

methods.name: get_reports
methods.description: Asynchronously creates tasks for each provider to generate reports and gathers the results.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main asynchronous function that runs the report generation and prints the results.
